document.full_text: hyundai motor co and the state of alabama will announce on monday "additional investment in the existing infrastructure" at its auto assembly plant near montgomery, the company said on sunday.
document.title: hyundai, alabama to make investment announcement
lines_and_colors: hyundai motor co and the state of alabama will announce on monday "additional investment in the existing infrastructure" at its auto assembly plant near montgomery, the company said on sunday.
